outfit_data.top: A flowy white cotton blouse with intricate embroidery detailing along the neckline and cuffs. The sleeves are voluminous and slightly cropped, cinched at the wrist with delicate black ribbon ties.
outfit_data.bottom: High-waisted, wide-leg linen pants in a deep navy blue. The fabric has a slight texture and drapes gracefully, creating a relaxed yet elegant silhouette.
outfit_data.shoes: Flat leather sandals in beige with criss-crossing straps and metallic silver accents.
outfit_data.extras: A long, chunky knit cardigan in grey draped casually over the shoulders.
